name: Yellow Tomato Marmalade
keywords: apple, orange juice, tomato, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 2 lemons, seeded and chopped, including the skins
2 pounds yellow tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the lemons and orange juice in a blender or food processor and process until the lemon is finely chopped. Transfer to a large, heavy saucepan, bring to a simmer and cook over medium-high heat until the lemon becomes transparent.

Add the remaining ingredients and continue to simmer over medium heat until they have thickened, about 30 minutes. Spoon into sterilized eight-ounce jelly jars and seal with paraffin or cover with canning lids and process in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes, then allow to cool, check lids and store in a dark place.
